Stephen.text: The Apple Watch 10 brings an updated design inspired by the Apple Watch Ultra in some way
Stephen.full-pick-text: The Apple Watch 10 brings an updated design inspired by the Apple Watch Ultra in some way
Stephen.notes: • Ungraded: "Action Button, flat glass or crown guard, for example"

Stephen.text: There will be no second-generation Vision Pro announced in 2024
Stephen.full-pick-text: There will be no second-generation Vision Pro announced in 2024

Stephen.text: Apple announces a new Apple Silicon system-on-a-chip
Stephen.full-pick-text: Apple announces a new Apple Silicon system-on-a-chip

Stephen.notes: • In Stephen's mind, this requires a 27" or larger screen, and a Pro/Pro Max caliber processor at least.

Stephen.text: The M1 iMac receives an update
Stephen.full-pick-text: The M1 iMac receives an update

Myke.text: A game made by a studio owned by Meta is released on Vision Pro
Myke.full-pick-text: A game made by a studio owned by Meta is released on Vision Pro

Myke.text: The first OLED iPad is introduced
Myke.full-pick-text: The first OLED iPad is introduced

Myke.text: There is a new, larger, non-Pro iPad
Myke.full-pick-text: There is a new, larger, non-Pro iPad

Myke.text: Apple unveils a new Studio Display Pro that is larger than the regular Studio Display and features a new screen technology than the smaller model
Myke.full-pick-text: Apple unveils a new Studio Display Pro that is larger than the regular Studio Display and features a new screen technology than the smaller model
Myke.notes: • Myke wavers on the "larger" clause but chooses to keep the pick unmodified when Stephen thinks it's important to the riskiness of the pick.
• Jason Snell was called in to adjudicate, as has been done before, and decides against Myke's somewhat strained logic that it was redesigned into a new size.

Myke.text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
Myke.full-pick-text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
Myke.notes: • Cleverly worded so that if the iMac isn't touched, the pick is still correct, but Federico's questioning of whether a change in hue counts causes Myke to water it down to just names. At the time of the pick, the colors were "Blue, Green, Pink, Silver, Yellow, Orange, Purple".

Federico.text: A new iPad Pro will feature...
Federico.full-pick-text: A new iPad Pro will feature a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace
Federico.notes:
• "... a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace."
  • Before the episode, this pick also included the detail of some models coming with more than 16 GB of RAM, but in keeping with the new, less outlandish tone of risky picks, Myke asked that it be toned down a bit.

Federico.text: iOS 18 will bring new AI features based on LLMs with some generative capabilities
Federico.full-pick-text: iOS 18 will bring new AI features based on LLMs with some generative capabilities

Federico.text: The keyboard for iPad Pro is substantially redesigned for the first time since its introduction in 2020
Federico.full-pick-text: The keyboard for iPad Pro is substantially redesigned for the first time since its introduction in 2020
Federico.notes:
• Federico's cohosts generously helped workshop some of the possible nitpicks out of the pick.
  • Ungraded: "function row, backlight, material change, multiple USB ports, different viewing angles"

Federico.text: Apple introduces a new desktop keyboard and/or trackpad that supports connecting to multiple devices at once. They also support USB-C connections now
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple introduces a new desktop keyboard and/or trackpad that supports connecting to multiple devices at once. They also support USB-C connections now

Federico.text: The MacBook Air is not updated at this event
Federico.full-pick-text: The MacBook Air is not updated at this event

Federico.text: The visual design of the 14" and 16" MacBook Pro is unchanged
Federico.full-pick-text: The visual design of the 14" and 16" MacBook Pro is unchanged
Federico.notes: • The word "visual" was added, but it's agreed that we'll know it when we see it.
